abbot.editor.widgets

Class AbstractAnimatedIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • abbot.editor.widgets.AnimatedIcon
      • abbot.editor.widgets.AbstractAnimatedIcon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.Icon
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SpinningDial

    public abstract class AbstractAnimatedIcon
extends AnimatedIcon
    Provide animation of auto-generated animations. Makes use of the repaint tracking structure established by AnimatedIcon.
